bioconda.name: mapdia
bioconda.summary: Performs essential data preprocessing, including novel retention time-based normalization method and a sequence of peptide/fragment selection steps, and more importantly, hierarchical model-based statistical significance analysis for multi-group comparisons under representative experimental designs.

biocontainers.name: mapdia
biocontainers.summary: Performs essential data preprocessing, including novel retention time-based normalization method and a sequence of peptide/fragment selection steps, and more importantly, hierarchical model-based statistical significance analysis for multi-group comparisons under representative experimental designs.
